connectionProperty.form: ["instanceName",{"key":"url","isConnect":true},{"key":"username","isConnect":true},{"key":"apiToken","type":"password","isConnect":true},"swProjectName",{"key":"deleteWorkspace","type":"radiobuttons","style":{"selected":"btn-info","unselected":"btn-default"},"titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes"},{"value":"no","name":"No"}]},{"key":"isParameterised","validationMessage":"You must select this","title":"This Project is Parameterised","type":"radiobuttons","style":{"selected":"btn-info","unselected":"btn-default"},"titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes"},{"value":"no","name":"No"}]},{"key":"queryParam","type":"textarea","condition":"model.isParameterised=='yes'"},{"key":"isScheduled","type":"radiobuttons","validationMessage":"You must select this","title":"Build Periodically","style":{"selected":"btn-info","unselected":"btn-default"},"titleMap":[{"value":"yes","name":"Yes"},{"value":"no","name":"No"}]},{"key":"schedule","condition":"model.isScheduled=='yes'"},{"type":"submit","style":"btn-info","title":"Apply"}]

integrationProperty.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"receipientList":{"title":"Receipient List","type":"string","default":""},"source":{"title":"Source","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins 2.7"},"authentication":{"enum":["yes","no"],"default":"yes"},"destination":{"title":"Destination","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins Email Sender"},"jenkinsAdmin":{"title":"Jenkins Admin Address","type":"string","default":"cape.devteam@gmail.com"},"label":{"title":"Label","type":"string","default":"Sends email from jenkins"},"smtpMail":{"title":"SMTP Mail","type":"string","default":"cape.devteam@gmail.com"},"smtpPassword":{"title":"SMTP Password","type":"string","default":"randomtext"},"smtpHost":{"title":"SMTP Host","type":"string","default":"smtp.gmail.com"},"smtpPort":{"title":"SMTP Host","type":"string","default":"465"},"componentName":{"title":"Component Name","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"Jenkins Email Sender"},"clazz":{"title":"Implementation Class","type":"string","readonly":true,"default":"com.mindtree.cape.component.domain.EmailSender"}},"required":["source","destination","label","componentName","clazz","smtpMail","smtpHost","smtpPort","smtpPassword"]}
